sevenbridges-python documentation!
=========================

sevenbridges-python is a `Python <http://www.python.org/>`_
library that provides an interface towards `SevenBridges/CGC <https://www.sbgenomics.com/>`_ public API.

It works with Python versions 2.6+ and supports Python 3.

The Seven Bridges Platform is a cloud-based environment for conducting bioinformatic analyses.
It is a central hub for teams to store, analyze, and jointly interpret their bioinformatic data.
The Platform co-locates analysis pipelines alongside the largest genomic datasets to optimize processing.
It allocates storage and compute resources on demand, to meet the needs of ever-growing analyses.


Content
-----------

   quickstart
   sevenbridges
